duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting customers, running the register, making purchase suggestions, and working with the food program.
Maintaining high standards for store appearance and providing fast and friendly service to customers.
Interacting with many customers daily and accomplishing daily tasks around the store.
Selling products to customers and providing excellent customer care.
Performing at a quick pace while working as part of a team to accomplish daily goals and coming up with great ideas to solve problems.
